episodes.title: Sufi Cults Pt III
episodes.description: Episode 7 Sufi Cults Pt3:  In a day and age with many intruders and falsifiers we find tasawauf has been misused and mislead in Islam. Part 3 of this episodes highlights those intruders and mischievous individuals who use tasawauf to mislead the masses. We discuss that and much more in this episode.   Host Ustadh Omar along with Shaykh Aamer and Hafiz Bilal discuss this important topic once again.  Stay MIC’D Up!

episodes.title: Sufi Cults
episodes.description: MIC’D UP Podcast Episode 4, Highlighting Sufi Cults. How so called Shaykhs/Pirs and Nasheed Artists have made a mockery of the religion. Shaykhs and Pirs alike have manipulated the minds of innocent Muslims for their own agenda while making lots of money.   Host: Omar Qadri  Guests: Aamer Qadri and Hafiz Yahya   Subscribe To YouTube: MIC’DUP416  Donate To Our Masjid/Cause: Donate.Suficouncil.com

episodes.title: Sufi Cults Part II - MIC'D UP S1 EP.16
episodes.description: MIC’D Up | Ep16 | Season Finale | Sufi Cults Pt II |   Join us live Saturday March 27th 2021 at 5pm when we bring back a highly anticipated Part 2 about Sufi Cults. What is Sufism? What has Sufism Turned into? What is true Sufism and why is this now a BIG business now a days? Plus much much more.   Tune in on YouTube, Facebook channels to watch. Like comment and subscribe on YouTube (Link In Bio)  Listen Live On Spotify | Apple Podcast | Google Podcast | Anchor | Pocket Cast |   Host: Br Omar Qadri @omar1qadri  Guest: Imam Hamzah Abdul Maliki @hamzaabdulmalick7 and Aamer Qadri @aamerkhan6692   Sponsor Information : March 2021 IG Wealth Management @igwealthmanagement  Kamalhusain Rathod QAFP Consultant  700-295 The Westmall, Etobicoke ON, M9C4Z4 Office: 416-695-8600 ext 4206 Cell: 647-289-8786 Email: kamalhusain.rathod@ig.ca  Donate to our cause: meccacenter.ca
